Retrieve the number of vertices from a SpatialLines or SpatialPolygons object

Source: R/linefuns.R
n_vertices.Rd

Returns a vector of the same length as the number of lines, with the number of vertices per line or polygon.

n_vertices(l)

Arguments

l

A SpatialLines or SpatalPolygons object

Details

See http://gis.stackexchange.com/questions/58147/ for more information.

Examples

n_vertices(routes_fast)
#>  [1]   2  53  97  37  41  73 104  53   2  44  59  79  97 121  98  65   2  64  84
#> [20] 114 131  44  59  55   2  22  52  64  46  79  75  22   2  27  65  70  87 105
#> [39]  52  27   2  46 114 126 130  69  65  46   2
n_vertices(routes_fast_sf)
#>  [1]   2  53  97  37  41  73 104  53   2  44  59  79  97 121  98  65   2  64  84
#> [20] 114 131  44  59  55   2  22  52  64  46  79  75  22   2  27  65  70  87 105
#> [39]  52  27   2  46 114 126 130  69  65  46   2
